reviewText: I live the Shaw brothers films.  This is a good one to add to your collection if you are a true marital arts fan.  Buy it
This movie blew me away especially towards the end
This movie was one of Ti Lung's best. The story is somewhat a love story, but not enough to detract from the action. Ti Lung collector must have and a Fu fan favorite.

Ti Lung is one of my favorites and I thought I had all of his movies, so I was surprised to find this one. However, once I watched it, I understood why I had never heard of it. it is not one of his better movies. The storyline is childish and the action lacks the intensity and excellence that we have come to know him for.
The martial arts was good.  The movie flowed easily and the concept was clear.  The english subtitle needs to be improve and also the size of the letters need to be bigger.

In response to the previous review-Yeah,like there's so many other options to buy 30 year old Shaw Bros films. The IVL has the same PAL-NTSC conversion so there really is no other alternative. The film is perfectly watchable.
Another non-anamorphic pal>ntsc transfer from Well Go USA. Shaw Brothers fans looking for a good quality release should look elsewhere.
